summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1776 for the improvement of First Avenue West, and Second Avenue West, each from West McGraw Street to West Fay Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wood crosswalks, and grading and curbing the same where necessary, in accordance with Resolution No. 1345 under Ordinance No. 18675, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
